|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, microSD Card |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = HDMI out |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/31/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00B0TSCLY |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = RF-LINK RL-UM02 |rad1modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188CUS; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== As this device is listed in FCC test report of [[Geniatech Enjoy TV Nano (ATV310B)|ATV310B]] (FCC ID: ZJU-000120010), :this device uses an [[RF-LINK RL-UM02]] Wi-Fi module (''[[Realtek]]'' RTL8188CUS). There are probably [http://www.geniatech.com/news/geniatech-upgrades-hdmi-stick-atv100.asp multiple revisions of this device]. *CPU: ARM Cortex A9 @800MHz (single core, 3D engine) ==Links of Interest== *[http://androidyo.com/2012/09/15/unboxing-atv100-amlogic-8726-m3-tv-stick/ Unboxing ATV100 AMLogic 8726-M3 TV Stick]
*[http://www.cnx-software.com/2012/06/09/geniatech-enjoy-tv-stick-atv100-amlogic-aml8726-m3-android-4-0-hdmi-dongle/ Information + a video showing the device] :The extendable metal antenna on the device is apparently for Wi-Fi. :The last one is M1. ''What's the difference between M1 and M3?'' :A lower power consumption and we can support DDR3 (1GB DDR3 RAM) :There is a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB_On-The-Go USB OTG] (Female Micro-B used for power) port on-board. [[Category:English Documentation]]
